title: Asking the server to explain a charge on the bill

turns.ai_conversation_starter_en: Would you like me to explain the charge for you? Sure, let me go ahead and get your check for you. All set? Have a great day!
turns.user_response_option_en: Thank you for explaining. I understand it now. Here's my payment. Have a good one!"
